```
...
  include_vars: /home/admin/vault.yml
  tasks:
    name: connect to a web service
    shell: service-x -user user1 -password "{{ vault_user_pass }}"
...
```

```
version: '2'
settings:
  conductor:
    base: 'ubuntu:xenial'
  project_name: webserver

services:
  web:
    from: centos:7
    command: [nginx]
    entrypoint: [/usr/bin/entrypoint.sh]
    ports:
      - 80:80
    roles:
      - nginx-server
```

```
galaxy_info:
   author: alibi
   description: A generic webserver
   licence: GPL3

   galaxy_tags:
        - container
        - webserver
        - nginx
```
